summary: A young man who despises his father's criminal profession, wants to live a peaceful life away from him but fate has some other plans.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Madhoo|Arif Khan|Jagdeep|Aruna Irani|Satyendra Kapoor|Raza Murad|Amrish Puri|Anjana Mumtaz|Goga Kapoor|Iqbal Durrani|Suresh Chatwal|Brahmachari|Dan Dhanoa|Ghanshyam Rohera|Aparajita|Raja Duggal|Vishal Khanna|Tilak Raj|Shabnam|Ravi Didya|Ram Sakhre|R.C. Nanda|Ashok Singh|Tony Sharma|Rana Jung Bahadur|Praveen|Salim Khan Ding-Dong|Purnima|Prakash Rathod|Nitin Wadia|Ankush|Anthony|Anuradha|Nirmala|Devendra Randhawa|Jai Singh Nijjar|Mahendra Sharma|Maqsood
title: Phool Aur Kaante
